entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 40 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 28 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
